location_machine_xrefs.condition:
-The centrifuge targets are awarded every time you hit the left flipper which results in too many centrifuge multiballs and at totally unpredictable times.

-The ramp does not register after the first ball is locked, so Skull Multiball is not possible to achieve.

-Similarly, none of the Microscope Multiballs can be achieved without seemingly getting the ramp shot spotted..?

-Noticeable right lean.

-The High scores are totally unrealistic because of the centrifuge error and should be reset. 4 billion points on this game? Sure... Because every time you hit the left flipper it scores points and you can just start Multiball over and over and over.

-Really? 5 for $6 for a game that plays like this?  That's crazy.  Spend your pinball dollars at one of the many nearby good venues.
